      • findAllNotAppliedProjects

        @Query(nativeQuery=true,
       value=" select p.id from Project p where p.id not in (select projects_id from Freelancer_Project where freelancers_id = ?1)")

      • findAllByFilter

        @Query(value="select p from Project p where p.id in (select p3.id from Project p3 where p3.id in ?1) and p.id in(select p1.id from Project p1 inner join p1.category.skills s where s.skillTitle in ?2 )and p.id in (select p2.id from Project p2 where p2.category.categoryTitle = ?3  and p2.budget between ?4 and ?5)")
